Package ulb.infof307.g02.model.sql_interface

Interface SQLSubModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
IngredientRecipe, IngredientShoppingList, IngredientStore
public interface SQLSubModel
Interface implemented by SQLModels that are contained by other SQLModels. Those "SubModels" are composed of a reference to the SQLContainer they are part of, the reference to the SQLBaseModel they are an instance of and finally the additional information they contain. Use Case : Suppose that you add an ingredient to a recipe. The BaseModel is the ingredient while the container is the recipe. In this case, the SubModel is defined as "a certain quantity of that ingredient goes in this recipe", we thus save the id of the ingredient (BaseModel), the id of the recipe (container) and the quantity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    completeAndInsert(int baseModelId, int containerModelId)
    Receive the references to two elements and complete the SubModel before inserting it to the database

  • Method Details

    • completeAndInsert

      void completeAndInsert(int baseModelId, int containerModelId) throws SQLException
      Receive the references to two elements and complete the SubModel before inserting it to the database
      Parameters:
      baseModelId - : the id of the SQLBaseModel associated (IngredientRecipe is an ingredient -> Ingredient id)
      containerModelId - : the id of the SQLContainer associated (IngredientRecipe is contained by recipes -> Recipe id)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the insertion into the database failed
